backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types, authorization mixin, persistent state maps, ID counters, and seeded restaurant and menu item data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that updates image URLs for menu items 46â€“53 and returns the modified actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten short summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, theme layers, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading the frontend app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring TanStack Router routes, authentication state, layout, and profile setup handling.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence and item CRUD operations.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart item structures used in the UI layer.
Handles login/logout with Internet Identity and shows UI states, clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gatekeeper component that prompts the user to log in before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Renders an image that swaps to a fallback source on load failure and resets when the src changes.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides reusable loading skeletons, error display, and empty-state UI components.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, cart badge, auth button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for collecting and saving a user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Retrieves order status and order items for a specific order using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Loads the authenticated user's orders, currently returning an empty list pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Executes order placement and invalidates order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Fetches a restaurant and its menu by ID using backend actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Loads the full list of restaurants from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables, including light/dark color tokens and background image setup.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management and checkout flow using Internet Identity and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays details and status of a specific order with refresh and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Shows the logged-in user's list of orders with status, totals, and navigation to order details.
Loads a restaurant and its menu, allowing quantity selection and adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Lists available restaurants with images and navigation to each restaurant's detail page.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Provides fallback image paths and mappings from dish names to generated images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for security.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, architecture, issues, and required image assets for the ICP food ordering app.
